template.example:
🚀 From basic lookups to intelligent automation: MCP DadosBR v0.3.2 brings enterprise-grade Brazilian data intelligence to your AI workflows
Two months ago, we launched with simple CNPJ and CEP lookups. Today, we're shipping a complete intelligence platform that automatically researches companies, validates data, and delivers insights in under 25 seconds.
✨ What's New in v0.3.2:
• CNPJ Intelligence: Automated multi-query workflows with 100% accuracy filtering • Tavily Integration: Enterprise search replacing DuckDuckGo with guaranteed precision • Edge Deployment: Running on Cloudflare Workers globally • One-Click Install: Smithery integration for instant setup
🎯 The game-changer: Our intelligence tool doesn't just search - it orchestrates, validates, and filters. Every result is verified to contain actual CNPJ data, eliminating noise and false positives.
📦 Get started: `npm install @aredes.me/mcp-dadosbr`
🔗 Explore: • Docs: github.com/user/repo • Live Demo: your-domain.com • Full Changelog: Release notes link

guidelines.guideline: Each tweet should be self-contained but part of narrative
First tweet determines if people read the thread
Mix formats: some text-only, some with links, some with questions
End with CTA or question to drive engagement
